Text: I'm not accusing you of any wrongdoing, but 1.54 MegaBytes for 101 books, including  some cover art just seems a bit miraculous.  That works out at 15 kilobytes PER book, including the picture.
lol..  its ONE book about 100 of the best scifi novels. (at least in the authors opinion)
Ah - to be fair, that wasn't really all that obvious from the title of the torrent.  I sort-of expected it to the actual books.
